Notes: Full implementation with Access Analyzer service integration
Checks if Kafka clusters use customer-managed KMS keys for encryption at rest
Validates enhanced monitoring, JMX and Node exporters for Kafka clusters
Ensures client-broker and inter-broker encryption is enabled
Checks that Kafka clusters are not publicly accessible
Validates mTLS or alternative authentication methods (SASL/IAM)
Checks security groups for unrestricted access to Kafka ports
Ensures Kafka clusters use the latest available version
Validates SSL/TLS encryption for Kafka connectors
